alert.note: Alert for Big Island North; Kohala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 09 at 3:36PM HST until February 10 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM FRIDAY FOR MOST OF OAHU... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY EVENING OVER THE KOHALA MOUNTAINS AND WAIMEA AREA ON THE BIG ISLAND... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY EVENING FOR MOST LOWER ELEVATION AREAS... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY EVENING FOR THE SUMMITS OF MAUNA KEA MAUNA LOA AND HALEAKALA... .Strong high pressure northeast of the state will produce locally damaging trade winds over and downwind of island terrain through Friday. ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST FRIDAY... * WHAT...East winds 25 to 40 mph with localized gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...Kohala mountains and the Waimea areas on the Big Island. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST Friday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down trees and power lines and damage roofs. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Strong winds may lead to property damage. Hazardous driving conditions due to powerful cross winds will pose a serious risk for drivers, especially for light weight and high profile vehicles. Loose outdoor items should be brought inside or secured properly.
